app.name: Vercel CLI
app.one_liner: A command-line interface for deploying and managing applications on Vercel's cloud platform.

screens.name: Deployment Dashboard
screens.purpose: View and manage active deployments, projects, and environments.

rust_commands.name: deploy_project
rust_commands.purpose: Initiate a new deployment for a given project path using local or remote configuration.

rust_commands.name: discover_integrations
rust_commands.purpose: List available integrations with optional search query support.

mvp_plan: week 1: Implement basic deploy command with cwd support
week 1: Integrate logging for dev server (stdout/stderr routing)
week 1: Set up local development environment using pnpm
acceptance_tests: CLI successfully deploys a project using `vercel deploy --cwd=/path/to/project` with local changes.
Integration discovery command supports optional search queries and skips inline terms for browser-only installs.
Python runtime correctly routes log levels <= WARNING to stdout and >= ERROR to stderr during dev initialization.
